text: Hi, I'm new to using the GPU in julia computations. When I install `CUDA.jl` and try to use it, I get `CUDA_ERROR_COMPAT_NOT_SUPPORTED_ON_DEVICE`. Any ideas why that would happen? I'm on a somewhat-offline cluster that has 1080Tis with CUDA11.0 installed

text: your `libcuda` has been partially upgraded without the corresponding kernel module being upgraded. your cluster needs a reboot.
